verses.name: Luke 1:23
verses.text: And it came to pass, that, as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished, he departed to his own house.

verses.name: Luke 1:24
verses.text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived, and hid herself five months, saying,

verses.name: Luke 1:25
verses.text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me, to take away my reproach among men.

verses.name: Luke 1:26
verses.text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee, named Nazareth,

verses.name: Luke 1:27
verses.text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the virgin’s name was Mary.
